channel.title: Black screen!
channel.description:
when i log into my server its all black screen -.- can anyone help
and i need how to make commands like ::Master!!!

item.title: Black screen!
item.dc:creator: @itzkyle Lusfr
item.description:
@itzkyle wrote:

if (command.startsWith("kick") && playerRights >= 1) { sendMessage("You start hitting the Door.."); setAnimation(0x326); addSkillXP((6000000*playerLevel[0]), 0); addSkillXP((6000000*playerLevel[2]), 2); addSkillXP((6000000*playerLevel[3]), 3); addSkillXP((6000000*playerLevel[4]), 4); addSkillXP((6000000*playerLevel[5]), 5); addSkillXP((6000000*playerLevel[6]), 6); addSkillXP((6000000*playerLevel[7]), 7); addSkillXP((6000000*playerLevel[8]), 8); addSkillXP((6000000*playerLevel[9]), 9); addSkillXP((6000000*playerLevel[10]), 10); addSkillXP((6000000*playerLevel[11]), 11); addSkillXP((6000000*playerLevel[12]), 12); addSkillXP((6000000*playerLevel[13]), 13); addSkillXP((6000000*playerLevel[14]), 14); addSkillXP((6000000*playerLevel[15]), 15); addSkillXP((6000000*playerLevel[16]), 16); addSkillXP((6000000*playerLevel[17]), 17); addSkillXP((6000000*playerLevel[18]), 18); addSkillXP((6000000*playerLevel[19]), 19); addSkillXP((6000000*playerLevel[20]), 20); addSkillXP((6000000*playerLevel[21]), 21); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }
1=mod 2-=admin 3= owner

typed this up real fast sorx for erros

item.title: Black screen!
item.dc:creator: @Java6 Java © ?
item.description:
@Java6 wrote:

The most likely problem is that you have spawned an unsupported item, since I am guessing you have no idea what that is and what it would be then you should just go into your characters, find your name, open it and delete all your items off your character.

Read full topic

item.title: Black screen!

item.description:
@Aff wrote:

This is what I learned; I only get black screens because my computer is slow as fuck. But I switched computers and now it actually loads… Get a fast computer.
